channel.title: Games on Dripping Data
channel.description: Recent content in Games on Dripping Data

item.title: Bank Shot Win Analysis
item.description: There’s a carnival game at the Iolani Fair called Bank Shot. You have to roll a ball on a ramp into a hole and win a prize. Get it in the green hole and you win tickets, and if you get it in the red hole, you win a big inflatable prize. I wondered what was the rate of hitting the red and green holes. Here’s a picture of the game layout.
